answers.answer: Must keep it dry.  Maybe clean it with alcohol.If it doesn't resolve see your doctor.  Depending if it is bacterial or fungal infection, there would be an appropriate cream to use to help it.Controlling your blood sugar is also critical to helping infection heal.
